pages.title: 发条稳定器
pages.text: <item>发条稳定器/$是<item>$(l:essentials:beam/stabilizer)石英稳定器/$的高级版本，设计用于高<thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beam)功率/$的中心化<thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beam)光束/$系统。$(br2)它会存储所有收到的<thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beam)光束/$，最多可存储 320,000 <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beam)功率/$。每$(l:essentials:intro/beam)周期/$，它会从正面输出总存储$(l:essentials:intro/beam)光束/$的 20%，

颜色和总存储$(l:essentials:intro/beam)光束/$相同。$(br2)这种特性可以“平滑”收到的<thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beam)光束/$，将脉冲转换为持续<thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beam)光束/$并减少输入的波动。$(br2)<item>$(l:essentials/circuits#reader)电路/$可测量存储的总<thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beam)功率/$。$(br2)
